-	shop	CARD05	-1,4401:-1,4402:-1,4403:-1,4404:-1,4405:-1,4406:-1,4407:-1,4408:-1,4409:-1,4410:-1,4411:-1,4412:-1,4413:-1,4414:-1,4415:-1,4416:-1,4417:-1,4418:-1,4419:-1,4420:-1,4421:-1,4422:-1,4423:-1,4424:-1,4425:-1,4426:-1,4427:-1,4428:-1,4429:-1,4430:-1,4431:-1,4432:-1,4433:-1,4434:-1,4435:-1,4436:-1,4437:-1,4438:-1,4439:-1,4440:-1,4441:-1,4442:-1,4443:-1,4444:-1,4445:-1,4447:-1,4448:-1,4449:-1,4450:-1,4451:-1,4452:-1,4453:-1,4454:-1,4455:-1,4456:-1,4457:-1,4458:-1,4459:-1,4460:-1,4461:-1,4462:-1,4463:-1,4464:-1,4465:-1,4466:-1,4467:-1,4468:-1,4469:-1,4470:-1,4471:-1,4472:-1,4473:-1,4474:-1,4475:-1,4476:-1,4477:-1,4494:-1,4495:-1

prontera,144,182,6	script	iShop WA#1	735,{
switch(select("-> Healing","-> Ore","-> Chemical","-> Third jobs","-> Homunculus","-> Pet","-> Other")) {
case 1:	callshop "PotionS",1;	end;
case 2:	callshop "T1S",1;	end;
case 3:	callshop "T2S",1;	end;
case 4:
switch(select("-> Rune Knight" , "-> Guillotine Cross" , "-> Ranger" , "-> Warlock" , "-> Mechanic" , "-> Shadow Chaser" , "-> Minstrel/Wanderer" , "-> Genetic")) {
case 1:	callshop "CR1",1;	end;
case 2:	callshop "CR2",1;	end;
case 3:	callshop "CR3",1;	end;
case 4:	callshop "CR4",1;	end;
case 5:	callshop "CR5",1;	end;
case 6:	callshop "CR6",1;	end;
case 7:	callshop "CR7",1;	end;
case 8:	callshop "CR8",1;	end;
}
end;
case 5:	callshop "T3S",1;	end;
case 6:	callshop "T4S",1;	end;
case 7:
switch(select("-> New Armor","-> New Weapon")) {
case 1:
switch(select("-> Head","-> Armor","-> Guard","-> Muffler","-> Shoes")) {
case 1:	callshop "HatS",1;		end;
case 2:	callshop "ArimorS",1;	end;
case 3:	callshop "GuardS",1;	end;
case 4:	callshop "MufferS",1;	end;
case 5:	callshop "BootS",1;		end;
}
end;
case 2:
switch(select("-> < Sword >","-> < Wand >","-> < Bow >","-> < Dagger & Katar >","-> < Spear >","-> < Axe >","-> < Violin >","-> < Knuckle >","-> < Gunslinger >","-> < Ninja >","-> < Bullet >")) {
case 1:	callshop "SwordS",1;	end;
case 2:	callshop "RodMaS",1;	end;
case 3:	callshop "BowS",1;		end;
case 4:	callshop "DaKaS",1;	end;
case 5:	callshop "SpearS",1;	end;
case 6:	callshop "AxeS",1;		end;
case 7:	callshop "BardDanS",1;	end;
case 8:	callshop "MonkS",1;	end;
case 9:	callshop "GunS",1;		end;
case 10:	callshop "NinjaS",1;	end;
case 11:	callshop "BTGNS",1;	end;
}
end;
}
}
end;
OnInit:
waitingroom "[ iShop ]",0;
end;
}
